channel.title: stickers on The Geek Trading Co.
channel.description: Recent content in stickers on The Geek Trading Co.

item.title: Keep calm and declare Exterminatus sticker
item.description: Surrounded by heretics? Lost in the Warp? Low on bolt shells? It is the only logical choice. Keep calm and declare Exterminatus. This message is approved by the Inquisition. These stickers are printed on durable, high opacity adhesive vinyl which makes them perfect for regular use, as well as for covering other stickers or paint. The high-quality vinyl ensures there are no bubbles when applying the stickers. High opacity film that’s impossible to see through Fast and easy bubble-free application Durable vinyl, perfect for indoor use 95µ density Don’t forget to clean the surface before applying the sticker.

item.title: Nuffle he hates me sticker
item.description: It is the truth. We cannot lie to ourselves any more. Nuffle is a bastard! These stickers are printed on durable, high opacity adhesive vinyl which makes them perfect for regular use, as well as for covering other stickers or paint. The high-quality vinyl ensures there are no bubbles when applying the stickers. *High opacity film that’s impossible to see through Fast and easy bubble-free application Durable vinyl, perfect for indoor use 95µ density Don’t forget to clean the surface before applying the sticker.

item.title: Straight outta Cadia Sticker
item.description: Cadia guarded the only known navigable route to and from the massive Warp rift known as the Eye of Terror, a passage called the Cadian Gate. The world’s dangerous proximity to the Eye of Terror made it necessary for the people of Cadia to heavily fortify the planet. Cadia still STANDS! These stickers are printed on durable, high opacity adhesive vinyl which makes them perfect for regular use, as well as for covering other stickers or paint.

item.title: Straight outta Cadia t-shirt
item.description: Cadia guarded the only known navigable route to and from the massive Warp rift known as the Eye of Terror, a passage called the Cadian Gate. The world’s dangerous proximity to the Eye of Terror made it necessary for the people of Cadia to heavily fortify the planet. Cadia still STANDS! This t-shirt is everything you’ve dreamed of and more. It feels soft and lightweight, with the right amount of stretch.
